definition: diminished in size or strength as a result of disease, injury, or lack of use, usually referring to an organ or body part
details:
adjective
- diminished in size or strength as a result of disease, injury, or lack of use, usually referring to an organ or body part
= example: diminished in size or strength as a result of disease, injury, or lack of use, usually referring to an organ or body part
= synonyms: atrophied
- very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold
= synonyms: bony
- not used to good advantage
= synonyms: squandered
- serving no useful purpose
= synonyms: otiose
